name: Notification of Deletion of Service/Resource on Appointment
description: Notification sent when a service or resource that was erroneously added to an appointment is permanently deleted
businessPurpose: Remove erroneously added services or resources from appointments to maintain data integrity and prevent statistical processing errors
timing: Sent when a service or resource that was added in error needs to be permanently removed from an appointment
realWorldScenarios: Anesthesia erroneously added to local procedure - delete the incorrect service
Wrong interpreter language added to appointment - remove erroneous entry
Equipment mistakenly assigned to wrong procedure type - delete incorrect allocation
Duplicate nursing support accidentally added - remove the duplicate entry
Training appointment incorrectly included real services - delete all test services
Wrong department services added due to scheduling error - delete incorrect entries

generationRules.SCH.1: Appointment ID with service/resource being deleted
generationRules.AIG: Resource group deletion details if applicable
generationRules.NTE: Reason for deletion often included for audit trail
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: Critical - accurate deletion prevents removal of valid services and maintains appointment integrity
